text: Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ma? An la cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, ranhou shi ta shenru dixia, huiliu cheng quan, ranhou, jie ci er shengzhang chu wuyanliuse de zhuangjia [zhu], ranhou shi ta kuwei, ni kanjian ta bian huang, ranhou ta [an la] shi ta bian cheng suipian. Dui you lizhi de renmen, ci zhong que you yi zhong jiaohui.
